query:
A few days ago I decided to take my dog Sable for a walk.
She is a half-pit bull half-bulldog with a lot of strength.
After I got her leash on I opened the garage to head outside.
She tried bolting out of the garage and dragged me along with her.
Output:
reference_ending: After the half hour walk my muscles were sore as if I had worked out.

query:
Jan's lamp broke.
Jan decided to get a new lamp.
He went to the store.
He found a lamp he liked.
Output:

This year I watched the NBA dunk contest with my friends.
The dunks were out of this world!
Aaron Gordon and Zach LaVine put on a great show for the fans!
I have never seen those kind of dunks before in my life!
Output:
reference_ending: Zach LaVine barely beat Aaron Gordon in the finals.

query:
It was Tyler's first day of Kindergarten.
He was very nervous.
He clung to his mother's leg, but she finally left and he had to stay.
After a little while, he started to take part in the class.
Output:
reference_ending: By the end of the day, he was glad he had gone!

query:
Gloria wanted to find a special new dress for her anniversary dinner.
She ordered a fancy black dress that looked lovely in a catalog.
When the dress arrived, Gloria was excited to try it on.
Sadly, the dress was frumpy and saggy and the zipper broke at once.
Output:
reference_ending: Gloria was very disappointed and returned the dress for a refund.

query:
I wanted to run a computer program.
But, my computer didn't have enough RAM.
So, I decided to upgrade my RAM.
Alas, my computer didn't allow RAM upgrades.
Output:
reference_ending: I decided to buy a new computer.

query:
Roxy and Sam had everything they needed to make a huge sand castle.
They spent the morning talking about their design.
After lunch they started construction.
By evening, everyone was gathered around their masterpiece.
Output:
reference_ending: It was the biggest sand castle they had ever built.

query:
Bailey needed a haircut.
One day she went to a salon.
The salon gave her a haircut.
She loved how healthy her hair felt.
Output:
reference_ending: She made a plan to come back in three months for another haircut.

query:
It had been raining for 2 days straight.
The sky finally turned blue.
When I looked up there was a rainbow.
It stretched for miles across the town.
Output:
reference_ending: It was a beautiful sight after a rainy day.

query:
Jake was biking at the park.
He didn't notice a large mud puddle in the ground.
His bike splashed mud all over his pants.
Jake changed into shorts when he got back to his car.
Output:
reference_ending: He put his dirty clothes into a plastic bag.
